definitions.title: vb. denom. Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִלָּבֵב]] get a mind; [[וְאִישׁ נׇבוּב יִלָּבֵב וְעַיִר פֶּרֶא אָדָם יִוׇּלֵד]] shall an empty man get a mind or a wild ass's colt be born a man (?) Job 11:12.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: encourage; Pf. [[לִבַּבְתִּנִי בְּאַחַד֠ מֵעֵינַיִךְ]] .…[[לִבַּבִתִּנִי]] Ct So 4:9, So 4:9 thou hast encouraged me, thou hast encouraged me with one of thine eyes Ew Gi Gr RV m (AV RV Ges Hi De Öt (cf. So 5:6) ravished my heart,—Pi. priv. Ges:§ 52 h).
